name: Uranium Fever (Demo)
description:
We get several valuable materials from mining, like coal, metals, minerals, etc. But they may not be the only thing down there. There could be pockets of radioactive materials that after long-term exposure can lead to several health hazards. 

In this game, you go deep into a coal mine with a Geiger Counter to root out the radioactive zones and make the place, a tiny bit safer.

Controls:

wasd to move

L Shift to sprint

'E' to mark a zone (only when you reach the hotspot)

Source Files :

https://github.com/GeorgeJ2021/Uranium-Fever

This game is made by George Jose Ambooken (20BCG10019) studying B.Tech Computer Science with Gaming Technology at VIT-Bhopal.
